extDesc.message: Helps users find Canadian alternatives for products and learn about local businesses.

great_news.message: Great news! "$1" appears to be made or sold in Canada.

looks_international.message: This product looks international. Consider these Canadian alternatives:

notification_message.message: Looking for products? Don't forget to check for Canadian alternatives with Maple Swap!

badge_none.message: No badge yet. Start choosing Canadian products to earn badges!

onboarding_intro.message: This extension helps you find Canadian-made alternatives to products when shopping online. By choosing local alternatives, you support Canadian businesses and reduce environmental impact.

onboarding_how_text.message: Click the extension icon and search for a product name. If the product is not Canadian, you'll see a list of Canadian alternatives. Click on an alternative to see more details, save it to favorites, or buy it.

onboarding_feature_favorites.message: Save your favorite Canadian products to a list for quick access later.

onboarding_feature_share.message: Share alternative information with friends easily.

onboarding_feature_stats.message: View your stats and achievements in the dashboard (see how many products you've switched to Canadian, CO2 saved, jobs supported).

onboarding_feature_accessibility.message: Enable High Contrast mode for better accessibility, and use the extension in English or French.

fact_dairy.message: Canadian dairy farmers adhere to high standards and support thousands of local farms.

fact_beverage.message: Many Canadian beverage companies are independently owned. Choosing them supports local businesses and jobs.

fact_default.message: Choosing Canadian alternatives helps support local communities and reduce environmental impact.
